詫びをいれる: (わびをいれる) - to make an apology
詫びを入れる: (わびをいれる) - to make an apology
詫び入る: (わびいる) - to apologize sincerely; to apologise sincerely
詫び寂び: (ワビサビ) - aesthetic sense in Japanese art emphasising quiet simplicity and subdued refinement
詭弁: (きべん) - sophistry; sophism; chicanery; play on words
詭弁を弄する: (きべんをろうする) - to use sophistry
詭弁学派: (きべんがくは) - sophist school (of philosophy)
詭策: (きさく) - ruse; ploy; trick; chicanery; booby trap
詭辯: (きべん) - sophistry; sophism; chicanery; play on words
詮ない: (せんない) - unavoidable; no help for
詮方無い: (せんかたない) - it cannot be helped/there is no way; intolerable/unbearable
詮索: (sensaku) - investigação sobre, indagação sobre, intromissão (em), investigação, busca, exploração
詮索好き: (せんさくずき) - nosy person; busybody
詮議立て: (せんぎだて) - considering thoroughly; making a thorough investigation; discussing thoroughly
詰ます: (つます) - to corner (esp. an opponent's king in shogi); to trap; to checkmate
詰まらない物ですが: (つまらないものですが) - It's not much, but...; phrase used when giving gifts
詰まらなさそう: (つまらなさそう) - bored; bored-looking; uninterested
詰まらなそう: (つまらなそう) - bored; bored-looking; uninterested
詰まり: (tsumari) - that is to say, that is, in other words, I mean, that (isso, isso) means; in short, in brief, to sum up, ultimately, in the end, in the long run, when all is said and done, what it all comes down to, when you get right down to it, basically , that is to say, that is, in other words, I mean, that (this, it) means; in short, in brief, to sum up, ultimately, in the end, in the long run, when all is said and done, what it all comes down to, when you get right down to it, basically; clogging, obstruction, stuffing, (degree of) blockage; shrinkage
詰まる: (つまる) - to be packed (with)/to be full (space, schedule, etc.); to be blocked (road, pipe, etc.)/to be clogged/to be plugged up; to shorten (width, interval, etc.)/to shrink (shirt, word form, etc.)/to narrow; (often in the form …につまる)  to be at a loss/to be hard pressed; to end up/to be settled; to become a geminate consonant; {baseb} to hit the ball near the handle of the bat
詰まるところ: (つまるところ) - in short; in brief; to sum up; ultimately; in the end; in the long run; when all is said and done; what it all comes down to; when you get right down to it
詰まる処: (つまるところ) - in short; in brief; to sum up; ultimately; in the end; in the long run; when all is said and done; what it all comes down to; when you get right down to it
詰まる所: (つまるところ) - in short; in brief; to sum up; ultimately; in the end; in the long run; when all is said and done; what it all comes down to; when you get right down to it
詰む: (つむ) - to become fine (of fabric); {shogi} to be checkmated; to be hard pressed/to be at a loss/to reach the limits
詰め: (tsume) - stuffing, packing; end (especialmente a base de uma ponte) , stuffing, packing; end (esp. the foot of a bridge); lowest-ranking guest at tea ceremony; tea master
詰めかける: (つめかける) - to crowd (a house); to throng to (a door)
詰めて通う: (つめてかよう) - to frequent tirelessly
詰める: (つめる) - to stuff into/to jam/to cram/to pack/to fill/to plug/to stop up; to shorten/to move closer together; to reduce (spending)/to conserve; (usu. as 根を詰める)  to focus intently on/to strain oneself to do; to work out (details); to be on duty/to be stationed; to corner (esp. an opponent's king in shogi)/to trap/to checkmate; (the meaning "to catch one's finger" is predominantly used in Kansai)  to cut off (one's finger as an act of apology)/to catch (one's finger in a door, etc.); to continue .../to keep doing ... without a break; to do ... completely/to do ... thoroughly; to force someone into a difficult situation by ...
詰め切る: (つめきる) - to be or remain always on hand
詰め合せ: (つめあわせ) - combination; assortment (of goods); assorted basket or box (e.g. of chocolates)
詰め合せる: (つめあわせる) - to pack an assortment of goods, etc.
詰め合わせ: (つめあわせ) - combination; assortment (of goods); assorted basket or box (e.g. of chocolates)
詰め合わせる: (つめあわせる) - to pack an assortment of goods, etc.
詰め寄る: (つめよる) - to draw near/to draw closer; to press someone (e.g. for an answer)
詰め将棋: (つめしょうぎ) - chess problem; composed shogi problem
詰め掛ける: (つめかける) - to crowd (a house); to throng to (a door)
詰め換える: (つめかえる) - to repack; to refill
詰め替える: (つめかえる) - to repack; to refill
詰め物: (つめもの) - filling or packing material; stuffing; padding
詰め腹: (つめばら) - being forced to commit seppuku; to be forced to bear responsibility and resign from one's position
詰め腹を切らされる: (つめばらをきらされる) - to be forced to bear the responsibility and resign; to be driven out of office
詰め袖: (つめそで) - kimono with completely attached sleeves (i.e. lacking an opening on the side under the armpit)
詰め込み主義: (つめこみしゅぎ) - (belief in the desirability of) education by rote learning
詰め込み勉強: (つめこみべんきょう) - cramming (e.g. for an exam)
詰め込む: (つめこむ) - to cram; to stuff; to jam; to squeeze; to compress; to pack; to crowd
詰め開き: (つめびらき) - bargaining/negotiation; turning one's body to the left or right and standing (when leaving the presence of nobility, etc.); sailing close-hauled/sailing on a close reach
詰め開きで: (つめびらきで) - at close reach (sailing); at close haul
詰らない物ですが: (つまらないものですが) - It's not much, but...; phrase used when giving gifts

詰る: (なじる) - to rebuke; to scold; to tell off
詰切る: (つめきる) - to be or remain always on hand
詰合せ: (つめあわせ) - combination; assortment (of goods); assorted basket or box (e.g. of chocolates)
